Type%20Definitions.html#/c:SLRNetworkMon.name: SLRNetworkMonitorUserInfoKey
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:SLRNetworkMon.abstract: Convenience typedef for user info keys in notifications posted from instances of SLRNetworkMonitor.

Enums/SLRNetworkMonitorType.html#/c:@E@S.name: SLRNetworkMonitorTypeWiFi
Enums/SLRNetworkMonitorType.html#/c:@E@S.abstract: Monitor that only monitors internet connectivity via WiFi.

Enums/SLRNetworkMonitorType.html#/c:@E@S.name: SLRNetworkMonitorTypeCellular
Enums/SLRNetworkMonitorType.html#/c:@E@S.abstract: Monitor that only monitors internet connectivity via Cellular.

Enums/SLRNetworkMonitorType.html#/c:@E@S.name: SLRNetworkMonitorTypeWired
Enums/SLRNetworkMonitorType.html#/c:@E@S.abstract: Monitor that only monitors internet connectivity via Ethernet.

Enums/SLRNetworkMonitorType.html#/c:@E@S.name: SLRNetworkMonitorTypeAll
Enums/SLRNetworkMonitorType.html#/c:@E@S.abstract: Monitor that only monitors internet connectivity via any available interface type.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorDidS.name: SLRNetworkMonitorDidStartMonitoringNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorDidS.abstract: Notification posted when an instance of SLRNetworkMonitor begins monitoring the device’s network connectivity status.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorDidS.name: SLRNetworkMonitorDidStopMonitoringNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorDidS.abstract: Notification posted when an instance of SLRNetworkMonitor stops monitoring the device’s network connectivity status.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.name: SLRNetworkMonitorNetworkStateDidChangeNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.abstract: Notification posted when an instance of SLRNetworkMonitor detects a change in the device’s network connectivity status. Details are in the userInfo object.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.name: SLRNetworkMonitorNetworkStatusKey
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.abstract: Notification user info key that contains the current network connectivity status (nw_path_status_t) wrapped in a NSNumber.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.name: SLRNetworkMonitorNetworkUsesWiFiKey
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.abstract: Notification user info key that contains a boolean of whether or not the current network uses WiFi wrapped in a NSNumber.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.name: SLRNetworkMonitorNetworkUsesCellularKey
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.abstract: Notification user info key that contains a boolean of whether or not the current network uses Cellular wrapped in a NSNumber.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.name: SLRNetworkMonitorNetworkUsesWiredKey
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.abstract: Notification user info key that contains a boolean of whether or not the current network uses Ethernet wrapped in a NSNumber.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.name: SLRNetworkMonitorNetworkIsExpensiveKey
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.abstract: Notification user info key that contains a boolean of whether or not the current network uses an expensive route wrapped in a NSNumber.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.name: SLRNetworkMonitorNetworkSupportsIPv4Key
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.abstract: Notification user info key that contains a boolean of whether or not the current network supports IPv4 wrapped in a NSNumber.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.name: SLRNetworkMonitorNetworkSupportsIPv6Key
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.abstract: Notification user info key that contains a boolean of whether or not the current network supports IPv6 wrapped in a NSNumber.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.name: SLRNetworkMonitorNetworkHasDNSKey
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.abstract: Notification user info key that contains a boolean of whether or not the current network has a DNS configuration wrapped in a NSNumber.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.name: SLRNetworkMonitorNetworkIsConstrainedKey
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorNetw.abstract: Notification user info key that contains a boolean of whether or not the current network is constrained.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorUsab.name: SLRNetworkMonitorUsableInterfacesKey
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorUsab.abstract: Notification user info key that contains a NSDictionary of interface names (NSString) to a NSArray of their usable address(es).

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorDNSS.name: SLRNetworkMonitorDNSServersKey
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorDNSS.abstract: Notification user info key that contains a NSArray of DNS server addresses as NSStrings.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorCell.name: SLRNetworkMonitorCellularProvidersKey
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorCell.abstract: Notification user info key that contains a NSDictionary of cellular services (NSString) to a CTCarrier objects that contain information about the cellular provider.

Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorCell.name: SLRNetworkMonitorCellularRadioTechnologiesKey
Constants.html#/c:@SLRNetworkMonitorCell.abstract: Notification user info key that contains a NSDictionary of cellular services (NSString) to a NSString representation of their active radio technology.

Classes/SLRNetworkMonitor.html#/c:objc(c.name: -initWithMonitorType:workQueue:notificationQueue:
Classes/SLRNetworkMonitor.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Designated initializer that creates a new instance of a SLRNetworkMonitor of a specific type, work queue, & notification queue.

Classes/SLRNetworkMonitor.html#/c:objc(c.name: +monitorWithType:workQueue:notificationQueue:
Classes/SLRNetworkMonitor.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Convenience initializer that creates a new instance of a SLRNetworkMonitor of a specific type, work queue, & notification queue.

Classes/SLRNetworkMonitor.html#/c:objc(c.name: +monitor
Classes/SLRNetworkMonitor.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Convenience initializer that creates a new instance of a SLRNetworkMonitor with the default configuration.

Classes/SLRNetworkMonitor.html#/c:objc(c.name: -startMonitoring
Classes/SLRNetworkMonitor.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Tells a SLRNetworkMonitor to begin monitoring for network connectivity status changes.

Classes/SLRNetworkMonitor.html#/c:objc(c.name: -stopMonitoring
Classes/SLRNetworkMonitor.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Tells a SLRNetworkMonitor to stop monitoring for network connectivity status changes.

Type%20Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type%20Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
